Job Description: Online Marketing Events Specialist

Do you have the following skills, experience and drive to succeed in this role Find out below.

Department: Marketing

Summary

We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented Online Marketing Events Specialist to join our dynamic team in the Hospitality industry. The ideal candidate will be responsible for planning, coordinating, and executing online marketing events to promote our brand and engage with our target audience.

Responsibilities

Develop and implement online marketing event strategies to drive brand awareness and customer engagement

Create compelling event content, including webinars, virtual conferences, and live streams

Coordinate with internal teams and external partners to ensure seamless execution of online events

Analyze event performance metrics and provide recommendations for improvement

Stay up-to-date on industry trends and best practices in online event marketing

Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field

2+ years of experience in online marketing event planning and execution

Proficiency in online event platforms and tools

Strong project management and organizational skills

Excellent written and verbal communication skills

If you are passionate about creating engaging online events and driving brand visibility, we want to hear from you! Apply now to join our team as an Online Marketing Events Specialist.

#J-18808-LjbffrRemote working/work at home options are available for this role.
